about_the_game:
Gnome Invasion!

A bunch of Gnomes for your adventures!
This product includes:
  • Gnome_Alchemist_F[adventurer,gnome,hero,Alchemist,Tinker]
  • Gnome_Alchemist_M[adventurer,gnome,hero,Alchemist,Tinker]
  • Gnome_Barbarian_F[adventurer,gnome,hero,barbarian]
  • Gnome_Barbarian_M[adventurer,gnome,hero,barbarian]
  • Gnome_Bard_F[adventurer,gnome,bard,dancer,whip,hero,artist]
  • Gnome_Bard_M[adventurer,gnome,bard,flute,magician,hero,artist]
  • Gnome_Caster_F[adventurer,gnome,magician,hero,caster,sorcerer,wizard]
  • Gnome_Caster_M[adventurer,gnome,magician,hero,caster,sorcerer,wizard]
  • Gnome_Druid_F[adventurer,gnome,hero,caster,druid,oracle]
  • Gnome_Druid_M[adventurer,gnome,hero,caster,druid,oracle]
  • Gnome_Farmer_F[adventurer,gnome,hero,peasant,farmer]
  • Gnome_Farmer_M[adventurer,gnome,hero,peasant,farmer]
  • Gnome_Fighter_F[adventurer,gnome,hero,fighter,warrior]
  • Gnome_Fighter_M[adventurer,gnome,hero,fighter,warrior]
  • Gnome_Guard_F[adventurer,gnome,hero,armored,cavalier]
  • Gnome_Guard_M[adventurer,gnome,hero,armored,cavalier]
  • Gnome_Monk_F[adventurer,gnome,hero,monk,brawler]
  • Gnome_Monk_M[adventurer,gnome,hero,monk,brawler]
  • Gnome_Noble_King[adventurer,gnome,king,noble,royal,royalty,leader]
  • Gnome_Noble_Queen[adventurer,gnome,king,noble,royal,royalty,leader]
  • Gnome_Ranger_F[adventurer,gnome,hero,ranger,hunter]
  • Gnome_Ranger_M[adventurer,gnome,hero,ranger,hunter]
  • Gnome_Rogue_F[adventurer,gnome,hero,rogue,thief]
  • Gnome_Rogue_M[adventurer,gnome,hero,rogue,thief]
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Kevin Doswell

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset. Compatible with Fantasy Grounds Unity or Fantasy Grounds Classic
detailed_description:
Gnome Invasion!

A bunch of Gnomes for your adventures!
This product includes:
  • Gnome_Alchemist_F[adventurer,gnome,hero,Alchemist,Tinker]
  • Gnome_Alchemist_M[adventurer,gnome,hero,Alchemist,Tinker]
  • Gnome_Barbarian_F[adventurer,gnome,hero,barbarian]

  • Gnome_Fighter_F[adventurer,gnome,hero,fighter,warrior]
  • Gnome_Fighter_M[adventurer,gnome,hero,fighter,warrior]
  • Gnome_Guard_F[adventurer,gnome,hero,armored,cavalier]
  • Gnome_Guard_M[adventurer,gnome,hero,armored,cavalier]
  • Gnome_Monk_F[adventurer,gnome,hero,monk,brawler]

Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Kevin Doswell

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset. Compatible with Fantasy Grounds Unity or Fantasy Grounds Classic

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation

name: Fantasy Grounds - Gnome Invasion!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7x, 8x, or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7x, 8x, or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
